Articles.Content:
Question: Are the mods B9 and KAS allowed? Or are mods taboo?

Mods aren't taboo. They're forbidden because if you use one, then everyone would have to use it. So the rule was made so no one uses them. That way everyone uses the same parts. Also, KAS is super buggy and B9 is unbalanced and over-powered.
With it being SaturdayÃ¢â‚¬Â¦I kinda expected much more activity
Its Saturday?! I thought it was Thursday! At least my new fleet is coming along nicely.

//BATTLE LOG//

///MU Escort Fighter Beta-3, reloaded in my last move, attacks the USSZS Phineas.///

I fired two shots from IVA view...

The hits took out some internals (but left others), and knocked out her last remaining engine.

After permanently disabling the Phineas' movement capability, leaving it isolated in high orbit, Beta-3's pilot moved to a low orbit around the planet for protection, since landing was risky due to the active missiles on the ruined Malevolence.

Beta-3 still has 3 shots.

Beta-2 still has 4 shots.

I feel pretty confident I can still take out the Thresher, and get even MORE ammo if need be. (Due to your mistake of wrecking the Fury the way you did, which left a tiny bit of ammo intact.)

Do you wish to yield, zekes? I can be merciful...

Persist:

http://www./download/p3dwxircbvbrg1b/persistent.sfs

Edited April 12, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h

Do you wish to yield, zekes?

DangÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.is Zeke losing his touch?

Im not done yet, im willing to try to the end...

and also, you had 6 ships and started first. That's a 2 ship advantage.

EDIT AHAHAHHAHA you lose! Butcher still has one emergency engine on the side!

and Phineas has RCS! That means can (probably) swing an intercept and launch off an SRB in the second im in range!

EDIT EDIT Oh my god im dying...Ok so get this. Thresher lines up for a kill, and I detach a missile in preperation to fire, and the SRB glitches and explodes... and somehow the front of the misile is flung forward, hits the Beta-2, and obliterates it. Not joking.

PERSIST: https://www./?q8h97ez79332enb

Edited April 13, 2014 by zekes

2fps and a half hour out of game,I'm almost willing to concede just so I don't have to put two behemoths within range of each other.

I only have spaceships, but i can make some quick tanks and stuff. what does surface battle mean exactly? Is it only tanks or is it planes etc

It means tanks or ocean vessels essentially, since planes would pretty much impossible to use outside of KMP, which is unstable.

So, yeah. Tanks!
